post.body: Merry Christmas to you. too. No rain here until Friday.
Merry Christmas Mister Mike!
merry Christmas to you, too. Just didn't feel like Christmas the year I was there.
Merry Christmas!
I've been enjoying this for a coupelweeks: http://freshfocus.info/blog/
Plus, if you favorite it, it is in your favorites to retweet at will
Each message has a URL http://twitter.com/rodtrent/statuses/1076426374
I used set outlook to 2 hours and twitter to 30 minutes. If they need a reply on the email < 2 hours, they should call or text
And when I did, I didn't SMS, so yes, it comes in my timeline
Ahh, still device less
Going to bed, G'night

I'm the anti-twitter spammer. I unfollow then refollow an hour later. Hilarious hijinks ensue.
Merry Christmas, Tweeters!

T-mobile, but I had verizon with the company phone. Unlimited data, but they paid per text message
